Battering Ram.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce your damage taken by 90% while using Shoulder Bash.

Battlement.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Increase the duration of Siege Shield by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Brawl.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Heal for {scale=80|80} over 2s for each enemy hit by Kinetic Burst.

Castle-Forged.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Reduce the Cooldown of Kinetic Burst by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Fortress Breaker.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Increase Siege Shield's maximum Health by 3000 and its size by 50%, but reduce its Movement Speed by 80%.

Furious Charge.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Increase the Knockback distance of Shoulder Bash by {scale=8|8}%.

Gate-Crasher.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce the Cooldown of Shoulder Bash by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Percussion.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Increase the Knockback distance of Kinetic Burst by {scale=8|8}%.

Ramparts.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Reduce the Cooldown of Siege Shield by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Siege Engine.card_desc: [Kinetic Burst] Reduce the Cooldown of Siege Shield by {scale=1|1}s for each enemy hit with Kinetic Burst.

Thrive.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Heal for {scale=175|175} after hitting an enemy with Shoulder Bash.

Trebuchet.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo after activating Siege Shield.

Vanguard.card_desc: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after using Shoulder Bash.

War Machine.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Watchtower.card_desc: [Siege Shield] Increase the Health of Siege Shield by {scale=250|250}.

Belagerungsmaschine.card_desc: [Kinetische Explosion] Für jeden mit Kinetische Explosion getroffenen Gegner wird die Abklingzeit von Belagerungsschild um {scale=1|1}s reduziert.

Ersch\u00fctterung.card_desc: [Kinetische Explosion] Erhöht die Rückstoßweite von Kinetische Explosion um {scale=8|8}%.

Festungsbrecher.card_desc: [Belagerungsschild] Belagerungsschild bewegt sich 80% langsamer, hat 3000 LP mehr und ist um 50% größer.

Festungsmauer.card_desc: [Belagerungsschild] Erhöht die Dauer von Belagerungsschild um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Geschmiedet.card_desc: [Kinetische Explosion] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Kinetische Explosion um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Heavy Metal.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Kampfmaschine.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Prosperit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Schulterrempler] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Schulterrempler, wirst du {scale=175|175} LP geheilt.

Rammbock.card_desc: [Schulterrempler] Während Schulterrempler wird erlittener Schaden um 90% reduziert.

Schnellschuss.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Projektile fliegen 50% schneller und 100% weiter, nur explodieren die Projektile nicht mehr.

Schutzwall.card_desc: [Belagerungsschild] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Belagerungsschild um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Torbruch.card_desc: [Schulterrempler] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schulterrempler um {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Trebuchet.card_desc: [Belagerungsschild] Nach Aktivierung von Belagerungsschild wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Vorhut.card_desc: [Schulterrempler] Nach Verwendung von Schulterrempler wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=8|8}% reduziert.

W\u00fctender Ansturm.card_desc: [Schulterrempler] Erhöht die Rückstoßweite von Schulterrempler um {scale=8|8}%.

Zwist.card_desc: [Kinetische Explosion] Für jeden mit Kinetische Explosion getroffenen Gegner wirst du über 2s {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

Avant-garde.card_desc: [Coup d'épaule] Vous subissez {scale=8|8}% de dégâts en moins pendant 2s après Coup d'épaule.

Balle perforante.card_desc: [Arme] Vos tirs d'arme sont moitié plus rapides et parcourent 2 fois plus de distance, mais ils n'explosent plus.

B\u00e9lier.card_desc: [Coup d'épaule] Vous subissez 90% de dégâts en moins pendant la préparation de Coup d'épaule.

Charge folle.card_desc: [Coup d'épaule] Le recul de Coup d'épaule augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Engin de si\u00e8ge.card_desc: [Explosion cinétique] Le temps de recharge de Bouclier de siège diminue de {scale=1|1}s par ennemi touché avec Explosion cinétique.

Fer forg\u00e9.card_desc: [Explosion cinétique] Explosion cinétique se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Fortification.card_desc: [Bouclier de siège] Bouclier de siège dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

Indomptable.card_desc: [Armure] Vous obtenez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie.

Machine de guerre.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Percussion.card_desc: [Explosion cinétique] Le recul d'Explosion cinétique augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Pugilat.card_desc: [Explosion cinétique] Vous récupérez {scale=80|80} PV en 2s par ennemi touché avec Explosion cinétique.

Remparts.card_desc: [Bouclier de siège] Bouclier de siège se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Tour de guet.card_desc: [Bouclier de siège] Le Bouclier de siège a {scale=250|250} PV de plus.

Tr\u00e9buchet.card_desc: [Bouclier de siège] Activer le Bouclier de siège rend {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Vigueur.card_desc: [Coup d'épaule] Vous récupérez {scale=175|175} PV quand Coup d'épaule touche un ennemi.

\u5821\u5792\u7c89\u788e\u8005.card_desc: [攻城护盾] 攻城护盾的移动速度降低80%，护盾值提高3000点，护盾尺寸提高50%

\u653b\u57ce\u5f15\u64ce.card_desc: [动力爆弹] 动力爆弹每命中一个敌人都会使攻城护盾的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

Vanguardia.card_desc: [Empellón] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras usar Empellón.

Ar\u00edete.card_desc: [Ombrada] Reduz em 90% o dano recebido ao usar a Ombrada.

Catapulta.card_desc: [Escudo de Cerco] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição ao ativar o Escudo de Cerco.

Forjada no Castelo.card_desc: [Impacto Cinético] Reduz o intervalo do Impacto Cinético em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

M\u00e1quina de Guerra.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% seus intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Muralhas.card_desc: [Escudo de Cerco] Reduz o intervalo do Escudo de Cerco em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Percussora.card_desc: [Impacto Cinético] Aumenta a repulsão causada pelo Impacto Cinético em {scale=8|8}%.

\u0410\u0432\u0430\u043d\u0433\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Удар плечом] После использования Удара плечом вы получаете на {scale=8|8}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u0411\u043e\u0435\u0432\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0412\u044b\u043a\u043e\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Кинетический взрыв] Перезарядка Кинетического взрыва сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0414\u0440\u0430\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Кинетический взрыв] Каждое попадание по врагу Кинетическим взрывом исцеляет вас на {scale=80|80} ед. в течение 2 с.

\u0417\u0443\u0431\u0447\u0430\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Длительность Осадного щита увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041a\u0440\u0435\u043f\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Перезарядка Осадного щита сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041d\u0435\u0437\u0432\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Удар плечом] Перезарядка Удара плечом сокращается на {scale=1.2|1.2} с.

\u041e\u0440\u0443\u0436\u0435\u0439\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Снаряды из вашего оружия летят на 50% быстрее и на 100% дальше, но не взрываются.

\u041e\u0441\u0430\u0434\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Кинетический взрыв] Каждое попадание по врагу Кинетическим взрывом сокращает перезарядку Осадного щита на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0446\u0432\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Удар плечом] Попадание по врагу Ударом плечом исцеляет вас на {scale=175|175} ед.

\u0420\u0432\u0435\u043d\u0438\u0435.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u043b\u043a\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Кинетический взрыв] Дальность отбрасывания Кинетическим взрывом увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Осадный щит становится на {scale=250|250} ед. прочнее.

\u0422\u0430\u0440\u0430\u043d.card_desc: [Удар плечом] После использования Удара плечом вы получаете на 90% меньше урона.

\u0422\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Активация Осадного щита генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0425\u0435\u0432\u0438-\u043c\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u0428\u0442\u0443\u0440\u043c \u043a\u0.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Максимальная прочность Осадного щита повышается на 3000 ед., а его размер – на 50%, но скорость передвижения снижается на 80%.

\u042f\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Удар плечом] Дальность отбрасывания Ударом плечом увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

Sava\u015f A\u015fk\u0131.card_desc: [Omuz Darbesi] Omuz Darbesi ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonra {scale=175|175} Can iyileş.

Sert Vuru\u015f.card_desc: [Silah] Silah atışların %50 daha hızlı ve %100 daha uzağa gider ancak patlamaz.
